analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/22/0xcf1cc6ed5b653def7417e3fa93992c3ffe49139b.sol:
	Contract IEtherToken has payable functions:
	 - deposit (/unique_chucks/22/0xcf1cc6ed5b653def7417e3fa93992c3ffe49139b.sol#200-201)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

BancorQuickConverter.convertByPath has external calls inside a loop:
	- converter = ITokenConverter(smartToken.owner()) (/unique_chucks/22/0xcf1cc6ed5b653def7417e3fa93992c3ffe49139b.sol#427)

BancorQuickConverter.convertByPath has external calls inside a loop:
	- _amount = converter.change(_fromToken,toToken,_amount,_minReturn) (/unique_chucks/22/0xcf1cc6ed5b653def7417e3fa93992c3ffe49139b.sol#436-439)

BancorQuickConverter.convertByPath has external calls inside a loop:
	- _amount = converter.change(_fromToken,toToken,_amount,1) (/unique_chucks/22/0xcf1cc6ed5b653def7417e3fa93992c3ffe49139b.sol#436-439)
